modName: UNP Armored Bikini - Player Inventory Fix
summary: A small fix for Ortog initial 1.1 version of the UNP Armored Bikini: this removes the item from your character inventory and adds a ground item nif. Cleaned with TES5Edit.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/4324947-1411829645.jpg[/img]

[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ffd966][size=6][b]UNP ARMORED BIKINI - Player's Inventory Fix[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[color=#1e84cc][size=3]by Hoamaii[/size][/color]
[line]
[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]MOD DESCRIPTION:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

I've been using Ortog's initial UNP Armored Bikini with Hagrid's leather textures like forever. But it always troubled me that the item sat in my PC's inventory from the beginning of the game and that it looked like Bandit armor in my inventory.

So this is just a small complementary upload to fix that and suit my own taste.

For the most part, this is not my work. The original underwear meshes are from Dimon99 for his Dimonized UNP body mod (underwear version), the original .esp is from Ortog who created a craftable version of Dimon99's meshes called "UNP Armored Bikini".

All I did here was add a ground item nif to the bikini so that it has the proper appearance at the Forge UI, in your inventory and when dropped to the ground.

While I was at it, I also removed the bikini from the Player's inventory in the CK. Then I cleaned it all with TES5Edit.

So basically, the only way that you can get the bikini now is by crafting it at the forge under the leather section.
[line]
[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]IF YOU HAVE NO PREVIOUS VERSION INSTALLED:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

Use the COMPLETE version - be aware that you'll only get Vanilla textures in this mod though, you will still need to get textures from Ortog's, Hagrid's or Rockslinger - or anybody else who might have retextured Dimon99's meshes - you'll find a few links a little further down.


[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]IF YOU ALREADY HAVE ORTOG'S ARMORED BIKINI V 1.1 INSTALLED:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

Use the FIX version, it will only replace the .esp, clean your PC's inventory and add the ground item to your game. When installing with NMM, say yes to overwriting the .esp.


[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]IF YOU HAVE OTHER VERSIONS OF ORTOG'S ARMORED BIKINI INSTALLED:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

This is not for you, sorry, as this .esp does not include the hat, gloves or boots. You'll need to get them all from Ortog's mod (link below).

If you know your way around the CK, you're welcome to use the ground item you'll find in this file though.
[line]
[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]TEXTURES:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

Here are a few main links for you to download great textures to replace the Vanilla ones included in these files:

- Ortog's UNP armored bikini: [color=#548dd4][size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10020]UNP Armored Bikini[/url][/b][/size][/color]

- Hagrid's leather retexture (this is one I used in my screenshots): [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21324]UNP Armored Bikini Leather Retexture[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Rockslinger's Chainmail retexture: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10507]UNP Armored Bikini Chainmail Retexture[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]


Install one with NMM and say yes when asked to overwrite textures.
[line]
[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

Of course, both versions do REQUIRE Dimon99's UNP body: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP body[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

The Fix Version does require Ortog's UNP Armored Bikini version 1.1 too: [color=#548dd4][size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10020]UNP Armored Bikini[/url][/b][/size][/color]
[line]
[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]CREDITS AND THANKS TO:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Ortog for kindly letting me tweak his .esp and giving me permission to upload this.
- Dimon99 for his great UNP body and underwear meshes.
- Hagrid, who did a wonderful texturing work.
[line]
[color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]MY OTHER MODS:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Revenge of the Sexified Housecarls - Hoamaii Armor Mashup for Male: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35333]Revenge of the Sexified Housecarls[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Revenge of the Sexified Housecarls II - Hoamaii Inner Wear for Male: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35940]Hoamaii InnerWear for Male[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Revenge of the Sexified Housecarls III - Gannicus Modular Armor: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39730]Gannicus Modular Armor[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Revenge of the Sexified Housecarls IV - Hoamaii Modular Iron Armor for Male: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58482]Hoamaii Modular Iron Armor[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

- Have Pita on Lydia - Hoamaii Meat Sandwich: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57435]Hoamaii Meat Sandwich[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[line]
TOOLS USED:
- 3DS Max
- NifSkope
- Bethesda's Creation Kit
- TES5Edit

Please don't forget to endorse Ortog and Dimon99! [img]http://www.ecardmax.com/hoteditor/smileys/YahooIM/41.gif[/img]

Cheers,

Hoamaii
author: Hoamaii
